body_html:
Thanks Wen-Heng, this looks very good at first glance. There have been some changes to cuda_dnn.cc that I think would be worth integrating to mroc_dnn.cc. Do you think that would be feasible?

I think it might make sense to integrate the mroc_dnn files from the cuda_dnn files (at least the header, and potentiall the cc file as well to make it simpler to port changes going forward).

I think it might make sense to integrate the mroc_dnn files from the cuda_dnn files (at least the header, and potentiall the cc file as well to make it simpler to port changes going forward).
body:
Thanks Wen-Heng, this looks very good at first glance. There have been some changes to cuda_dnn.cc that I think would be worth integrating to mroc_dnn.cc. Do you think that would be feasible?

I think it might make sense to integrate the mroc_dnn files from the cuda_dnn files (at least the header, and potentiall the cc file as well to make it simpler to port changes going forward).
